summary: The diff implements the core course catalog app with manual/remote data sources, search, list/grid toggle, course detail with external open action, a warm non-blue theme, and persisted settings. However, it also introduces Internet Identity/auth-related infrastructure and backend actor scaffolding that were not requested and conflict with the "no login/auth" constraint. Image assets required by the BuildRequest are referenced but not verifiable from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: No login/authentication flow should be present; users access the course list immediately on load.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff adds Internet Identity provider/hooks and actor creation logic that support authentication and login behavior, conflicting with the no-auth requirement. While there may be no explicit login UI shown in the provided snippets, authentication capability is implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the required generated images: app icon (app-icon.dim_512x512.png) and hero illustration (hero-illustration.dim_1200x400.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references these image paths, but the actual image files are not included in the LLM-readable diff summary (they may be among omitted binary files). Cannot confirm implementation from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and related actor/identity plumbing (login/logout capability, identity-aware actor creation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids adding login/authentication requirements/flows; the diff introduces auth libraries and a provider.
BuildRequest requirements are frontend-only; no backend implementation was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer marketing/attribution link and social icon imports in the app shell.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; adds extra UI/branding elements beyond the course menu/catalog scope.
